title: SQL
content:
CREATE TABLE TableName
{
   variableName1 int,
   variableName2 varchar(#of outcomes)
};

INSERT INTO TableName
   ('column1' , 'column2' , '...');
VALUES
   (1, blah, blah,...) , ...
   (X, blah, blah... );

SELECT Variable
FROM TableName
WHERE SearchedVariable = 'XX%"; //% means any value
